snippet: The N.R.A. objects to an Op-Ed article, “I Hunt, but the N.R.A. Isn’t for Me.”
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''I Hunt, but the N.R.A. Isn't for Me,'' by Lily Raff McCaulou (Op-Ed, April 25), is another desperate, but predictable, election-year stunt to try to marginalize National Rifle Association members.

headline.main: The View From the N.R.A.: 'We'll Fight for You'
